long_description: Get the little guys and gals in a binding that will keep them safe as they swish their way down the slopes. Dual-action toepiece features a multidirectional release-an important factor for aggressive youngsters. Friction plate adapter makes it possible to use adult or junior boots. Heel piece features easy entry and release, so kids can get in and out of their skis quickly.
short_description: Get the little guys and gals in a binding that will keep them safe as they swish their way down the slopes.
